wordpressPage.content:
Gorilla Funds aims to make investing in Crypto-Funds as easy as possible by leveraging the phenomenal MELONPROTOCOL. Till today investing in Funds was neither easy nor cheap.

But in the future this will change fundamentally. No, not in the future: NOW. Every person can invest in Crypto-Funds without any permission, because the funds are living on the blockchain. And that means permissonless and cheap access to cryptofunds all over the world.

Today, there are only hundreds of funds: In a couple of years there will be tens of thousands, all competing against each other – to the benefit of all of us.

Gorilla Funds will be there to filter out the best of them all, to present them to you and to make investing as easy as possible. Thats our mission. Thats our goal.

Try it out now, explore the funds.
